entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and snow squalls ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
